**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 141 **Archetype** [Living Vessel](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=188) **Frequency** once per day **Prerequisites** [Living Vessel Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3815) --- You symbiotically combine your form with that of the entity within you, taking a powerful hybrid form to temporarily boost your abilities in combat while maintaining control. For 1 minute, you gain the following effects.
  • If you were Medium or smaller, you become Large, and your reach increases to 10 feet.
  • You gain a +2 status bonus to attack and damage rolls and a +1 status bonus on saving throws against spells. If you use [Entity's Resurgence](/Feats.aspx?ID=3815), the status bonuses to attack and damage rolls increase to +3 during the time that the two effects overlap.
  • If you have the [Entity's Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=3816) feat, the unarmed attack you gained from that feat increases its damage die from 1d6 to 1d8.
  • You gain 40 temporary Hit Points.
  • You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed.
**Special** This action has the tradition trait appropriate to your entity, typically [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48) for a [demon](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=28), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120) for an [aberration](/Traits.aspx?ID=1) or outer entity, or [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134) for a [fey](/Traits.aspx?ID=69)
name: Vessel's Form
